title: Episode 1 with tech start up Chthonic Software
description:
Chthonic Software team Emmanuel, Rachael, David and I discuss their new livestream platform called Entropy. We look at why live streaming is in need of an upgrade, and what services their platform provides. We also speak about censorship in the tech world at large

Check out Entropy for yourself! Here's their website: chthonicsoftware.com 
Follow them on
twitter: @ChthonicTeam
youtube: https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCNAePYj7BQ9Z1944248boBg/videos

follow me on:
twitter: @theother_95
instagram: @theother95
facebook: @theother95page

email me at theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
